document_data.mainbody:
Tezza was a maid at the The Rising Moon in Highmoon in Deepingdale in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Tezza was old but sharp-eyed.
During spring cleaning each year in the 1350s DR, Tezza would clean the glass and mica windows, fearing they were too valuable for Shandril Shessairs hands.
